column5: I have a very nice Abu line counter reel. Can you use this reel to cast for pike and or Muskie?? Does it screw up the line counter function? I am not a reel officianodo so have no idea. Thanks guys.
The reel counter should have a reset button...so no.
It would make a better trolling reel, but if you want to cast with it, why not?
id go easy on it... try not to make burning high speed super long distance casts...  but ive used my trolling rod to cast a couple times...
Shouldn't harm it ... I've been doing it for years now .... but...  By " Stupid  Question" I thought you meant something like ...  What would chairs look like if our knees bent the other way ?  Randy
lmao....is it just me or is this funny as heck....even for the second time....
Another reason for a new reel, yeah:Gonefishing:
LOL Randy I just had the worst day in a long time and im sour....However you just made me kill myself laughing, just wanted to thank you for that..So Thank-you!
By " Stupid  Question" I thought you meant something like ...  What would chairs look like if our knees bent the other way ?  Randy     Thats a good one!!! LMAO
I was thinking the same thing.  I just bought a used combo. and it has an OLD K-Mart reel on it!  I thought it might birds nest if used for casting??
